DOC.brief_title: 34mm Cuff Study Endovascular Repair Abdominal Aortic Aneurysms
DOC.detailed_description: The 34mm proximal extension stent graft intend augment primary 28mm infrarenal bifurcate stent graft accommodate patient anatomy ( neck diameter 32mm ) provide effective seal prevent/repair proximal Type I endoleaks .
DOC.criteria: 18 year old old Informed consent understood sign Will comply protocol followup requirement Candidate conventional open surgical repair Aneurysm outer diameter one following : great equal 4.0cm great equal 3.0cm ( saccular aneurysm ) great equal twice normal aortic outer diameter rapidly grow ( great equal 5mm 6 month ) Proximal nonaneurysmal aortic neck fixation length great equal 1.5cm renal artery aneurysm Nonaneurysmal proximal aortic neck inner diameter 23 32mm Iliac artery internal diameter great equal 8 mm Life expectancy < 2 year Participating another clinical study Pregnant lactate woman Acutely ruptured/leaking aneurysm Traumatic vascular injury Other medical psychiatric problem Contraindication nonionic contrast medium anticoagulant Coagulopathy bleed disorder Active systemic localize groin infection Indispensable inferior mesenteric artery Connective tissue disease ( e.g. , Marfan 's Syndrome ) Creatinine level > 1.7 mg/dl Renal transplant patient Proximal attachment site > 60ยบ angle aneurysm body Iliac arteries > 90ยบ angle < 1.5 cm nonaneurysmal common iliac artery iliac bifurcation side [ One internal iliac artery require remain patent ] Thrombus > 30 % implantation site
